name: The Roadline Car
description:
The Roadline Car is created to enhance your reflexes and driving skills in an entertaining & addictive manner. You are basically going to pull your hair off the head, nibble your nails off the fingers and hop off the seat while playing this psyche preventing amusement.

The Roadline Car demands you to drive a car on mazy track while staying away from the edges, the direction of the car can be changed by tapping on the sides of the screen one by one, but; it isn't actually that simple as you are considering. You will have to be sharp and calculative while pushing ahead on the track, as the diversion gets mazier and quick bit by bit, even the scarcest of miss count will over your round, however, the amusement never ends. Install now and let the fun begin.

How to Play: Tap on the sides of the screen one after other to change the direction of the car, make sure to stay in the centre of the track in order to play smoothly without hitting onto edges.
What's inside?

 HD Graphics
 Cool Sound Effects
 Endless Run

Your Feedback is Important: Your valuable feedbacks & suggestions are very important for us in order to keep our production qualitative & innovative. Rate & review if you like the game and let us know what more do you want.
Stay Connected: Like us on the Facebook & Twitter and stay updated with our upcoming projects & news.
